api_list.api_description: Get a list of any upcoming scheduled maintenances for DigitalOcean.
Get information about a specific payload in URLhaus.

required_parameters.name: md5_hash
required_parameters.description: The MD5 hash of the payload.

required_parameters.name: sha256_hash
required_parameters.description: The SHA256 hash of the payload.

query: Please provide details on any upcoming maintenances for DigitalOcean, and also retrieve information about a payload with this SHA256 hash: 254ca6a7a7ef7f17d9884c4a86f88b5d5fd8fe5341c0996eaaf1d4bcb3b2337b.
